text.title: 110,000 YEARS OF GREENLAND CLIMATE
text.body: Preserved in the ancient ice covering Greenland is a high-resolution, 110,000-year history of local climate. The record shows large swings in temperature that eventually stabilized around 11,700 years ago. A few thousand years later, humans developed agriculture.
text.description: Greenland climate over 110,000 years, reconstructed from oxygen isotopes.
